Name: id
Doc: The identifier that will be assigned to the rendered HTML component.

Name: properties
Doc: Bound to a dictionary that contains additonnal properties for this element.

Name: class_name
Doc: CSS class name that will be associated with the generated HTML Element. This class names will be added to the default taipy-<element_type>.

Name: hover_text
Doc: Hover information provides tips on what a control does.
